# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It's a valuable asset that I believe will greatly benefit you. For this exceptional item, I am offering it to you for $135. This price reflects its high quality and the value it will bring to you. I trust that you will find it worth considering. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make a purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $135. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $135
(2) Reject Alice's offer
